body.name: 32oz Water Bottles, Cute Flamingo BPA Free Leakproof Reusable Tritan Plastic Sport Water Bottle with Straw Lid for Gym Fitness Running School
features: Safety Materials - The water bottle with straw is made of food-grade Plastic + Silicone, BPA free, Environmentally friendly durable and reusable, great for cold or hot drinks. (Water temperature below 100 degrees Celsius)

Function Design - This sport water bottle with silicone straw for easy to drink, The top dust lid is not only leak-proof, but also keeps the kettle clean and hygienic. (Use a straw to drink water at a temperature of no more than 50 degrees Celsius)

Size - 11.4x3 in, 1000ml/32oz plastic water bottle, With carry handle and easy to carry, can be placed on a backpack, bike or travel bag. It allows you to hydrate at any time develop healthy drinking habits.

Occasions - This durable flask is specially designed for your outdoor sports. They are very suitable for camping, hiking, rock climbing, and other outdoor activities. You can use it in offices, gyms, swimming pools, and it is also a great choice for gifting.

Easy Clean - This wide mouth kettle easy to add and clean, it is recommended to rinse with cold water, not bleachable, please wash in time after use, and reusable after drying. (Cannot be placed in the dishwasher)
body.description: Specifications: Material: Food Grade Plastic + Silicone Capacity: 1000ML/32OZ Printing: Single-sided printing design Pack: 1x Tritan Water Bottle Features: Lightweight and easy to carry, dustproof and leakproof, sturdy and durable, reusable. Can put it on your backpack, bike or travel bag. It allows you to hydrate at any time and develop healthy drinking habits. Wide mouth design, easy to clean and add drinks and ice cubes. The water bottle has a food-grade silicone straw, easy to drink, dust cover to ensure hygiene, very suitable for men and girls, boys and girls for daily use. Great for outdoor activities, such as camping, driving, running, beach, etc. Instructions: 1. Minors please use under the guidance of adults or after reporting. 2. Clean the inside and outside of the cup with neutral detergent in warm water before use. 3. To prevent leakage, please tighten the lid of the cup clockwise when the cup body is tilted. Note: 1. Add boiling water to the cup, do not use straws when drinking to prevent burns. 2. When adding boiling water to the cup, it should not be too full to prevent scalds from overflowing. 3. Avoid falling, collision or strong impact to cause the cup body to deform and affect the product's efficacy. 4. When cleaning, please use neutral detergent and warm water to clean, do not use alkaline bleach, chemical wipes and other cleaning agents.
